content: a piece of mc sew buckle to bottom of left side seam *note- you may also secure wrap with crochet instead of jeweled buckle for this method with cc and size l hook join yarn with slip_stitch at left bottom side seam chain 8 measure 1 ½ up side seam join chains to side seam at this point fasten_off weave in ends pass right front wrap through to secure ©2007 emily dame-gibes all rights reserved
